sentences.en: He took time out from campaigning to accompany his mother to dinner.
sentences.cn: 他暂停竞选活动陪她母亲吃晚饭。

sentences.en: With 22.2 seconds to go before halftime, Brown wanted to call a time- out.
sentences.cn: 距中场休息还有22.2秒时布朗想叫一次暂停。

sentences.en: You should spend more time out of doors in the fresh air.
sentences.cn: 你应多花点时间在户外呼吸新鲜空气。
